pages.text: 26|112|geuga malhagil geudeul-i haengha go issneun geos-i mueos-inji aneunba eobs doda
26|113|geudeul-ui gyesan-eun danji junimkkeiss-eum-eul neohuineun algo iss-eulila
26|114|naega midneun jadeul-eul chubanghaneunjaga animyeo
26|115|sillo naneun bunmyeonghan gyeong-gojala
26|116|ittae geudeul-i malhagil noayeonega man-il dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neo neun dol-e maj-a jugge doelila
26|117|geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui baeg seongdeul-i jeoleul geoyeoghanaida
26|118|jeowa geudeul saileul pangyeolhayeojusigo jeowa deobul-eo midneun jadeul-eul guhayeo jusoseo
26|119|hananim-eun geuwa hamkke jim-eul gadeugsil-eun baee tan jadeul-eul guhayeoss nola
26|120|geuleon hu hananim-eun dwie nam eun jadeul-eul igsake haess-euni
26|121|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss eoss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
26|122|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|123|adeuui baegseongdo seonjijadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|124|geudeul-ui hyeongje hudeuga malhagil neohuineun hananim-eul dulyeowo haji anh neunyo
26|125|sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|126|geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|127|geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anihani naui bosang-eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
26|128|neohuineun nop-eun gosmada gongheohanhyanglag-eul wihae geonmul-eul se-uneunyo
26|129|neohuiga yeongsaenghagoja gungjeon eul se-uneunyo
26|130|neohuineun tain-eul gong-gyeogham-e pog guncheoleom gong-gyeoghaessnola
26|131|hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-e ge sunjonghala
26|132|neohuiga algo issneun modeun geos eul jusin bun-eul dulyeowo hala
26|133|geubunkkeseoneun gachugdeulgwa jason deul-eul neohuiege jusyeoss-eumyeo
26|134|nag-wongwa umuldo jusyeossnola
26|135|sillo naneun simpan-ui nal neohui ege naelyeojil beol-i dulyeobdoda
26|136|geudeul-i daedabhagil nega seolgyo hadeun anihadeun uliegeneun machanga jila
